name: G-Switch 3+
description:
G-Switch 3+ is the definitive version of the popular gravity runner.

Play solo, or with up to 8 players on one keyboard!

FEATURING
  • Challenging single-player mode with 30 checkpoints throughout 3 different worlds.
  • Play Endless mode for the top high score.
  • Competitive local multiplayer mode for 2-8 players, with the possibility of computer opponents.
  • All multiplayer maps from from G-Switch 1 to G-Switch 3, plus 6 new ones, for a total of 21 maps to choose from.
  • Find secret orbs that unlock new characters.
  • Fullscreen HD graphics and improved performance.
LANGUAGES

English, German, Spanish, French, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Russian, Chinese.
